posts.post_content:
Just a "little" :rolleyes: help to get from [STRIKE]517 [/STRIKE] 518 to 520.

Foster (g/vg)
[STRIKE]Shaughnessy (g/vg)[/STRIKE]

Demmitt, StL (p, <$1,000)


-----------------------

Also, could use some upgrades (Piedmont, Sweet Caporal, OMSL only).  My commons are g/vg, but I'd like to get them up to vg/ex (40/5) range.  HOF and SL are f/g, but looking for g/vg.
